# Ignore CMake build directories and generated files
CMakeFiles/
CMakeCache.txt
cmake_install.cmake
Debug/
x64/
main.dir/

# Ignore Visual Studio project files
*.vcxproj*
*.sln
*.filters
.vs/

# Ignore compiled binaries and intermediate build files
*.obj
*.exe
*.dll
*.pdb
*.idb
*.log
*.ilk
*.manifest

# Ignore temporary Visual Studio files
*.ncb
*.suo
*.sdf

# Ignore miscellaneous temporary and backup files
*.tmp
*.swp
*.user
*.bak
*.old
